name: spotify_split_playlist
description: Create/reuse year-playlists from a source playlist and add tracks by album release year.

source_playlist.description: Spotify playlist URL or playlist ID

make_public.description: Whether to create resulting playlists as public (default false)

name: spotify_delete_year_playlists
description: Find and (optionally) unfollow/delete year playlists created from a source name.

source_name.description: The source playlist name (the prefix 'From <SourceName>:' is used).

year.description: Optional year to delete (e.g. '2017'). If omitted, deletes all years for the source.

force.description: If true, skip interactive confirmation (script will perform deletions).

no_tag_check.description: If true, ignore the creation tag guard and allow deletion even without the tag.
